title: Twitter Plans to Remove Tweets Promoting Rival Social Media Platforms
description: Elon Musk’s company said it would no longer allow ‘free promotion’ of platforms such as Facebook and Mastodon.

title: The Failed Promise of Online Mental-Health Treatment
description: Heavy advertising and other strategies from Silicon Valley’s playbook boost providers’ growth but not the quality of care.

title: ChatGPT Creator OpenAI Pushes New Strategy to Gain Artificial Intelligence Edge
description: The AI program captivating Silicon Valley with its sophisticated prose had its origins three years ago when tech investor Sam Altman moved research lab OpenAI away from its nonprofit roots.

title: It's Time to Boot Moochers Off Your Streaming Accounts
description: If strange activity suggests intruders are gaining access with your Netflix, Spotify or other logins, use these settings.

title: Instagram's Notes Feature Leaves Millennials Nostalgic, Gen Z Confused
description: The new function, which mimics AIM’s away messages, highlighted a generational divide among Instagram users.
